name: Waldir @ GitHub
body:
For now, this will be a central hub for my github projects, essentially a dashboard of what-to-do-next across all my repos.

### Todo
* **[hash-my-pass][1]:** continue working on the [new index page](http://waldir.github.io/hash-my-pass/index.new.html) ([source](https://github.com/waldir/hash-my-pass/blob/gh-pages/index.new.html)). cf. the [current one](http://waldir.github.io/hash-my-pass/)
* **[odot][2]:** check the [roadmap](https://github.com/waldir/odot/issues/milestones)
* **[primerpedia][3]:** [add a footer](https://github.com/waldir/primerpedia/issues/12)
* **[unix-manifests][4]:** TBD
* **[semantic-linebreaker][5]:** TBD
* **[holography-tutorial][6]:** TBD
* **[procrastinever][7]:** TBD

----
* Here's a [list of all my repos](https://github.com/search?q=%40waldir&type=Repositories)
* Here's an [overview of my commits](http://ghcontributors.herokuapp.com/waldir) to various repos
* Here's an overview of my [latest activity](https://github.com/waldir?tab=activity) at github

[1]: https://github.com/waldir/hash-my-pass/
[2]: https://github.com/waldir/odot/
[3]: https://github.com/waldir/primerpedia/
[4]: https://github.com/waldir/unix-manifests/
[5]: https://github.com/waldir/semantic-linebreaker/
[6]: https://github.com/waldir/holography-tutorial/
[7]: https://github.com/waldir/procrastinever/

### Non-github stuff:

**code**:
* [sourceforge](http://sourceforge.net/users/waldir) (nothing to see here)
* gitorious: 
* bitbucket: 
* [google code](http://code.google.com/u/117802857503272599472/)
* mediawiki: [gerrit](https://gerrit.wikimedia.org/r/#/q/owner:waldir%2540email.com+project:mediawiki/core+status:merged,n,z) (alt: [github](https://github.com/wikimedia/mediawiki-core/commits?author=waldir))

**bugs, translations, content**:
* launchpad: [commented bugs][LP1], [reported bugs][LP2], [translations][LP3]
* bugzilla: @mozilla ([reported][MZ], commented), ...
* translatewiki: 
* openstreetmap:
  [map](http://hdyc.neis-one.org/?Waldir),
  [wiki](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Special:Contributions/Waldir)
* mediawiki wikis: 
* other wikis:
  explainxkcd,
  [lyrics.wikia.com](http://lyrics.wikia.com/Special:Contributions/Waldir)
* SETI: [SETI@home][SETI1], [setiquest wiki][SETI2], [boinc-wiki.info][SETI3]

[[edit this page](https://github.com/waldir/waldir.github.io/generated_pages/new)]
